title: Maria's Dinner Surprise
story: Maria! It's time for dinner. Okay, mommy. I'm on my way. Sit on that chair, dear. This one? Yes, Maria. The big chair. I never sat here before. I made chicken tonight. Yum! I love your chicken, mom.
summary: Maria is excited to try her mom's chicken dinner for the first time.
image: An illustration of Maria sitting on a big chair at the dinner table with a plate of chicken in front of her.
